subject: Controller
description_text:
I'm looking for a pro plus clutch but none have been in stock for awhile
now. Can I use the pro x or plus x controller with my pro plus pedals?

conversations.body_text: Hi Brian Curtice,     Yes, you can use the PlusX clutch. You can also upgrade to the PlusX controller, which will enable support for vibration feedback motors.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-simulator-pedal-black

Awesome thank you.
